scripts.setup:clean: rm -rf node_modules bun.lock && bun run setup
scripts.deploy: bun run deploy:web && bun run deploy:api && bun run deploy:cms
scripts.deploy:api: bun run build:api && cd apps/api && bun run deploy
scripts.deploy:web: bun run build:web && cd apps/web && bun run deploy
scripts.deploy:cms: bun run build:cms && cd apps/cms && bun run deploy
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --local
scripts.db:migrate:stg: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --remote --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-prod --remote --env production
scripts.db:setup: bun run db:auth:generate && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate:local
